description: Focused on data-driven decision-making, machine learning, and visual analytics. Coursework included Advanced Visual Analytics, Data Management, Statistics, and Machine Learning. Thesis explored the application of deep learning models for industrial anomaly detection.
achievements: Developed predictive models using Python and Power BI for real-world datasets.
Assisted teaching in data science courses as a Teaching Assistant.
Published research on anomaly detection in offshore wind turbines.

description: Explored strategic management, marketing analytics, and financial decision-making frameworks. Focused on bridging business intelligence with operational efficiency and data analytics.
achievements: Completed a thesis on data-driven marketing strategies for emerging markets.
Collaborated on case studies analyzing organizational performance using KPI metrics.

description: Studied systems optimization, operations research, and process engineering. Built a strong quantitative foundation for data-driven problem solving and efficiency improvement.
achievements: Graduated with honors in Industrial Systems Optimization.
Completed capstone project on process improvement for a manufacturing firm.
